excerpt: This dish is perfect for a quick and healthy lunch, or a light dinner. It's full of protein, healthy fats, and delicious flavors!

instructions.name: Make Falafel
instructions: Combine chickpeas, garlic, onion, parsley, cumin, coriander, and salt in a food processor and pulse until the mixture is finely chopped but not pureed.
Add flour and baking powder to the mixture and pulse until just combined.
Using your hands, form the mixture into small balls, about 2 tablespoons each.
Heat 1 inch of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add falafel to the oil and fry until golden brown on all sides, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Transfer falafel to a paper towel-lined plate. Repeat with remaining falafel.

instructions.name: Assemble Salad
instructions: Divide mixed greens evenly among two plates.
Top each plate with tomatoes, cucumber, and radish.
Sprinkle lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper on top of the salad.
Place falafel on top of the salad and serve immediately.
